title: rune pages?
body: ok so i am lvl 54 and i tried playing a game until i encountered a problem. I was playing kayn and it wouldn't allow me to change my rune page. I was allowed to before that but now it just tells me that im not lvl 8 and locked in a preset rune page. Can someone help me with this problem?

replies.body:
I've seen some issues here and there where people have problems getting those pages to load when in champion select, but I haven't personally heard of someone being told they were too low level for runes O_O. 

Has this error happened in every game since then or was it able to fix itself? I'm curious if doing a quick config reset as well as adjusting your DNS settings to 8.8.8.8/8.8.4.4 might help make sure this doesn't happen again.
